h2_title: How to Understand the Mid-to-Late Game Skills Trees
content: Transformations add some spice to combat and can be hugely beneficial, especially as they have completely different health and status bars to your character.

The content is as follows:
Transformations add some spice to combat and can be hugely beneficial, especially as they have completely different health and status bars to your character.
